mapper.select: select no, name, description, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate, id from category where id = #{id}

select b.no, b.title, b.contents, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate, b.category_no as categoryNo from category a, post b where a.no = b.category_no and a.id=#{id} and a.no = #{no} order by b.no desc
select no, name, description, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate, id from category where id = #{id} order by no desc limit 1

select a.no, a.title, a.contents, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate, a.category_no as categoryNo from post a, category b where b.id = #{id} and b.no = a.category_no and b.no= #{categoryNo} and a.no != #{no} order by no desc
